name: A thick mithril band
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity a bit.
It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It decreases the users wisdom pathetically.
It decreases the users intelligence pathetically.
It has magnificent armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat faster than avarage.
